title: Green Hill, Alabama
text:
Green Hill is an <a href="Unincorporated%20area">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Lauderdale%20County%2C%20Alabama">Lauderdale County</a>, Alabama.
Green Hill is the hometown of <a href="Iron%20Horse%20%28band%29">Iron Horse Bluegrass</a>, <a href="Secret%20Sisters">Secret Sisters</a>, and <a href="Jason%20Isbell">Jason Isbell</a>, a singer-songwriter and former member of the <a href="Drive-By%20Truckers">Drive-By Truckers</a>.
